​

Suggested Dilution Ratio: 1-4%

Aroma Stick: Hard to discern - Strong Alcohol aroma / anise & brown sugar?

​

Single Flavor Test:  3%

60/40 | 0 Nic | Single 316L SS Fused Clapton | TigerTek Morphe RDA | Organic Japanese Cotton

1 Week Steep
